sourcesContent:
//component to add products to json //Gloria import React, {useState} from 'react' import "../css/AddProduct.css" function AddProduct({ addNewProduct }){ const [title , setTitle] = useState('') const [price , setPrice] = useState('') const [image, setImage] = useState('') const [description , setDescription] = useState('') const [category , setCategory] = useState('') const [rating , setRating] = useState('') const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const newProduct = { title: title, price: price, description: description, category: category, image: image, rating: rating, } fetch('http://localhost:8002/products', { method:'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type' : 'application/json' }, body:JSON.stringify(newProduct), }) .then((resp)=> resp.json()) .then((product)=> addNewProduct(product)) } return(
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setPrice(e.target.value)}/>
setDescription(e.target.value)}/>
setCategory(e.target.value)}/>
setImage(e.target.value)}/>
setRating(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default AddProduct;
